proyects.title: ShortLink
proyects.content: Web application designed to simplify and customize long URLs, turning them into short, easy-to-share links. This platform also includes user authentication and link management.

proyects.title: Hackthon Cloudinary
proyects.content: Halloween-themed project focused on adding or removing elements from user images. I demonstrated creativity and problem-solving skills.

proyects.title: Challenge FACTUS
proyects.content: Challenge by a Colombian company, which consisted of creating a platform that allows the generation of invoices using their API.

proyects.title: Ecommerce Admin
proyects.content: It facilitates the management of online stores, allowing you to manage products, categories and orders efficiently. It offers a control panel optimized for productivity

proyects.title: Ecommerce Store
proyects.content: Offers a complete online shopping experience, with Stripe integration for secure payments. Built with the above Admin eCommerce API.

proyects.title: API MVC
proyects.content: Backend solution that follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture pattern. It allows CRUD operations to be performed on a movie database, deployed on Railway.
